p: To further investigate the antiviral activity of myrrh oil components, we decided to test also furanodienone ( 1), furanoeudesma-1,3-diene ( 2), curzerene ( 3), and Î²-elemene ( 4) on A549 cells infected with PR8 virus. Indeed, these secondary metabolites are reported to be the main bioactive components of C. myrrha oil commercially available.
